panels.description: Only commands executed by the super user
panels.title: Sudo Bash Commands

targets.query: rule.id:100501 AND NOT data.dst_ip:10* AND NOT (data.dst_ip:255.* OR data.dst_ip:ff0.*) AND NOT data.dst_ip:129.206.100.126 AND (data.src_ip:10.20.30.60)
rule.id:100501 AND NOT data.dst_ip:10\.* AND NOT data.dst_ip:ff0* AND NOT data.dst_ip:255* AND data.ndpi.hostname:[* TO *] AND NOT data.dst_ip:129.206.100.126
rule.id:100501 AND NOT data.dst_ip:10\.* AND NOT data.dst_ip:ff0* AND NOT data.dst_ip:255* AND NOT data.ndpi.hostname:[* TO *] AND NOT data.dst_ip:129.206.100.126
rule.id:100501 AND NOT (data.src_ip:10.20.30.60) AND NOT (data.dst_ip:255.* OR data.dst_ip:ff0.*) AND data.src_ip:10.*
rule.id:100501 AND NOT (data.src_ip:10.20.30.60) AND (data.dst_ip:255.* OR data.dst_ip:ff0.*)
rule.id:100501 AND NOT (data.src_ip:10.20.30.60) AND NOT (data.dst_ip:255.* OR data.dst_ip:ff0.*) AND NOT data.src_ip:10.*
rule.id:100501 AND longitude AND NOT data.dst_ip:129.206.100.126
